name: Flea NES Full Game
description:
Flea is a challenging platformer with an intriguing back story. Play as Henry the Hyperactive Flea who just can’t stop jumping! Navigate the beast and collect blood to get the the heart of the problems. 

  • Explore over 80 levels
  • Discover secrets
  • Meet weird characters

This Contains:

  • NES ROM (Mapper 30, Mapper 2) [Some emulators only support 2]
  • Emulator images(For use in cover flow)
  • Digital Manual (PDF)
  • Soundtrack (WAV)

If you would like to buy this game physically on NES or Dreamcast visit my Website here:
http://lowtek.games

This game was funded with Kickstarter.
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/flea-game/flea-a-new-nes-game

Recommended emulator
https://www.mesen.ca/

Review Quotes:

“Never played anything like Flea. You've heard of "endless runners"? Flea is an endless jumper. The character is always hopping, and you have to navigate levels while always jumping up and down. It's novel and kinda neat. “ @IndieGamerChick

“Yea, it's totally unique and interesting. It feels like it's made in the same vein of Super Meat Boy. Hell, you can imagine that flea actually LIVES on Super Meat Boy. Hey SuperMeatBoy this should be made canon.” @IndieGamerChick

“It's NES's Meat Boy/N+” @IndieGamerChick
